name: GDKO Round 1 - Echoman
description:
GDKO Round 1 - Echoman

Imagine being in a cave. A dark one.  You can walk (A,D), you can jump (W), but you can't see anything. It's hard for you to traverse through the cave. Suddenly you realize that you can see something when you walk. It's the sound waves that bounces off the ground. What is weirder, you can emit the sound wave (Space). You can see even more! Hm.. Maybe that's why you're called Echoman...

Controls:
A,D - Move left/right
W - Jump
Space/Right Mouse Click - Emit soundwave

Credits:
Kenney.nl - 1bitplatformer pack

Source Code:
https://github.com/pstupka/GDKO2022

Made with Godot
